Beautiful B, Lovely L, Darling D.

Not quite the formal definition, but you get the idea.

item.title: Two Thoughts on Daylight Savings
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: One. It’s nice to be able to go to and return from work in something approaching daylight. Even if it is work. Two. I suspected it would take a government law to let me be able to stay in bed to seven (hell, eight) for one day at the weekend with two little ones who … Continue reading "Two Thoughts on Daylight Savings"
item.content:encoded:
One.

It’s nice to be able to go to and return from work in something approaching daylight. Even if it is work.

Two.

I suspected it would take a government law to let me be able to stay in bed to seven (hell, eight) for one day at the weekend with two little ones who consider weekends as get-up-early days!

item.title: Lightsabers
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: Today, in the endless quest for knowledge that all self-respecting 4-year olds have, L asked what is a Lightsaber, and how do they work? Where to begin?
item.content:encoded:
Today, in the endless quest for knowledge that all self-respecting 4-year olds have, L asked what is a Lightsaber, and how do they work?

Where to begin?

item.title: Hearts and Rocketships
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: I drew hopscotch for the kids. Using lots of colours, and getting them to call out the numbers. And for 10, we did hearts and baby stars just like L wanted. And then we started to play and I noticed that the boys weren’t quite into it as much. So at the bottom, under the … Continue reading "Hearts and Rocketships"
item.content:encoded:
I drew hopscotch for the kids. Using lots of colours, and getting them to call out the numbers.

And for 10, we did hearts and baby stars just like L wanted.

And then we started to play and I noticed that the boys weren’t quite into it as much.

So at the bottom, under the 1, I drew a rocket ship. Red flames, blue body, orange wings and antenna. Heading to the moon.

*Now* we had the hopscotch on.

item.title: The fastest 24:06…
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: …is the 24 minutes 6 seconds of Dora The Explorer when you are trying to get something done.
item.content:encoded: …is the 24 minutes 6 seconds of Dora The Explorer when you are trying to get something done.
